title: Caribbean Sea, Jamaica
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Fogg Museum, Gift of Sylvan Barnet and William Burto in honor of James Cuno
provenance: Hiroshi Sugimoto, created 1980, gift (?); to Eric Zetterquist, New York, sold; to Sylvan Barnet and William Burto, Cambridge (1997-2011), gift; to Harvard Art Museums, 2011. [Zetterquist worked in Sugimoto's New York gallery when Sugimoto was a dealer in Japanese art. Barnet and Burto surmise that Sugimoto occasionally gave Zetterquist a print as a gift or in lieu of part of his salary. Per correspondence with donor 2/11.]
